h1_title: How to Unlock the Chapter 2 Secret Area
h2_title: How to Find the Boar After the Crouching Tiger Temple
content: Thankfully, it's not too hard to find the Yellow-Robed Squire again but you'll need to have beaten the First Prince of Flowing Sands and grabbed the Arhat Gold Piece before you can continue. When you've met these conditions, he returns to the area where you first found him. This time, however, he won't be sitting on the rock.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Chapter_2_Secret_Area.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Chapter 2 Secret Area', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find the Boar After the Crouching Tiger Temple'.
The content is as follows:
Thankfully, it's not too hard to find the Yellow-Robed Squire again but you'll need to have beaten the First Prince of Flowing Sands and grabbed the Arhat Gold Piece before you can continue. When you've met these conditions, he returns to the area where you first found him. This time, however, he won't be sitting on the rock.
